name: Adventures of Kirk and Spock Quiz | Star Trek Universe | 10 Questions

questions.text: In "City on the Edge of Forever", Joan Collins has two possible fates. One is her early death. What is the other?
options: Author of a book on dealing with the Depression
questions.explanation:
Fame in the peace movement.

	This is a well-written story by Harlan Ellison.

questions.text: Kirk, McCoy and Spock go through the "Atavacron" to a different period of time. Which statement is true?
questions.correct: Kirk goes alone to a different time
options: All three go alone to different times
Spock goes alone to a different time
McCoy goes alone to a different time
questions.explanation:
Kirk goes alone to a different time.

	Kirk ends up alone while Spock and McCoy end up in an ice age environment.

Marj Dusay.

	Oliver is in the episodes that feature Jeffrey Hunter as a ship's commander. Muldaur is in two different episodes. Anderson appears in the episode about the actor, Karidian.

questions.text: Which famous American does Kirk seemingly encounter?
questions.explanation:
Lincoln.

	Spock encounters a famous Vulcan; Kirk meets Honest Abe.

questions.text: Which actress is one of "Mudd's women"?
questions.explanation:
Karen Steele.

	Meriwether is in another episode as a "sentry". Darby is a girl on a ravaged world. Ireland plays a "friend" of Spock. Roger C. Carmel is Mudd.

questions.text: Who defends Kirk when he is accused of a crime?
questions.explanation:
Elisha Cook.

	Brian plays a man who creates a Nazi society on another world. Walker plays a boy with special powers. Lenard appears as Spock's father (among other roles).

Robert Lansing.

	Lansing encounters Garr as he tries to fulfill his mission. Bower plays a seductress in a different episode. Daly plays an immortal in a different episode.

questions.text: What "secret" about "the Companion" is Glenn Corbett surprised to discover?
options: It's a product of his own imagination
questions.explanation:
It's a female.

	The episode also features Elinor Donahue.

questions.text: What is the "worship" word that Kirk accidentally speaks while imprisoned?
questions.explanation:
Freedom.

	The story concerns a war between the "yanks" and the "communists".

Plum.

	It was his nickname with an old girlfriend.
